wp:comment.wp:comment_content: No way would I unsubscribe from this blog. I think you're a pretty smart guy (albeit a bit misguided at times). Your technical content is very interesting and insightful. Your inane political rants are entertaining and amusing. I feel the same way about Charles Petzold. Unsubscribing from either source would be as silly as boycotting good movies due to the politics of the actors. Don't throw the baby out with the bath water. :-)
